title: Generalized CP Symmetries in Three-Higgs-Doublet Models
authors: Iris Bree, Duarte D. Correia, and Joao P. Silva
abstract:
We study the scalar and Yukawa sectors of three Higgs doublets models with a
generalized CP symmetry. We show that there are only four classes of scalar
potentials, merely one more than in two Higgs doublet models (2HDM). In 2HDM
with generalized CP symmetries extended to the Yukawa sector, there are only
two possible cases: the usual CP, with 18 real Yukawa couplings; and a minimal
generalized CP model, with 12 real Yukawa parameters. In contrast, with three
Higgs there is a rich variety of allowed models. We classify all possible
Yukawa textures, showing that there are 40 possibilities, several of which have
only 10 real Yukawa couplings.
